subject: Basketball
Athletics and Sports
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Last season, Cavs guard Sasha Pavlovic’s poor defense landed him on the bench. But as evidenced against the Nets on Sunday, he’s improved drastically since then.
snippet: Last season, Cavs guard Sasha Pavlovic’s poor defense landed him on the bench. But as evidenced against the Nets on Sunday, he’s improved drastically since then.
